text: وَإِذۡ أَخَذۡنَا مِيثَٰقَكُمۡ وَرَفَعۡنَا فَوۡقَكُمُ ٱلطُّورَ خُذُواْ مَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰكُم بِقُوَّةٖ وَٱذۡكُرُواْ مَا فِيهِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَتَّقُونَ

translation.en: And [recall] when We took your covenant, [O Children of Israel, to abide by the Torah] and We raised over you the mount, [saying], "Take what We have given you with determination and remember what is in it that perhaps you may become righteous
translation.id: Dan (ingatlah) ketika Kami mengambil janji kamu dan Kami angkat gunung (Sinai) di atasmu (seraya berfirman), "Pegang teguhlah apa yang telah Kami berikan kepadamu dan ingatlah apa yang ada di dalamnya, agar kamu bertakwa
